name: Rocket.Chat
description: Open-source team communication platform. Self-hosted Slack alternative.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  mongo:
    image: mongo:6
    container_name: rocketchat-mongo
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: mongod --oplogSize 128 --replSet rs0
    volumes:
      - {{MONGO_PATH}}:/data/db
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=rocketchat"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=communication"

  mongo-init-replica:
    image: mongo:6
    container_name: rocketchat-mongo-init
    command: >
      bash -c
        "for i in `seq 1 30`; do
          mongosh mongo/rocketchat --eval \"rs.initiate({ _id: 'rs0', members: [ { _id: 0, host: 'mongo:27017' } ]})\" &&
          s=$$? && break || s=$$?;
          echo \"Tried $$i times. Waiting 5 secs...\";
          sleep 5;
        done; (exit $$s)"
    depends_on:
      - mongo
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=rocketchat"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=communication"

  rocketchat:
    image: registry.rocket.chat/rocketchat/rocket.chat:latest
    container_name: rocketchat
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - MONGO_URL=mongodb://mongo:27017/rocketchat?replicaSet=rs0
      - MONGO_OPLOG_URL={{MONGO_OPLOG_URL}}
      - ROOT_URL={{ROOT_URL}}
      - PORT=3000
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:3000"
    volumes:
      - {{UPLOADS_PATH}}:/app/uploads
    depends_on:
      - mongo
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=rocketchat"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=communication"

notes: Create admin account on first access
Mobile apps available for iOS and Android
